header.name: Jane Doe
header.title: Product Designer
header.intro_text: Product designer with experience in user research, interaction design, and design systems. Passionate about creating intuitive experiences for complex technical products.

experience.description: Led design for the core analytics platform, improving usability for enterprise customers and driving adoption of self-service features.
Designed mobile and web experiences for a B2B logistics platform. Introduced a design system that reduced design-to-dev handoff time by 40%.
Conducted user research and designed interfaces for an early-stage SaaS product. Helped the team ship v1.0 and grow to 5,000 users.
Contributed to client projects across healthcare, finance, and education. Developed skills in wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing.

education.details: Graduated with honors. Focus on human-computer interaction and visual communication.
Thesis on designing for accessibility in complex data environments.

skills.items: interviews, contextual inquiry, usability testing, surveys, card sorting
Figma, Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite, Miro, FigJam
paper prototypes, interactive mockups, click-through demos, design systems
HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React basics, accessibility standards (WCAG)
